instructions: I have read the information provided in the Participant Information Form, and I agree to participate in this research project.
Please keep a record of the following information.
In particular, your user ID is required if you wish to exit the survey and resume completion later or delete your data from the survey's dataset.
Press the 'Next' button after you have filled in ALL the questions.
You will now see a list of statements. Please read all the statements then sort each into one of the three criteria given.
Use the arrow buttons below the statement card to scroll through the statements.
You may drag and drop the statements or click on the group to insert the selected statement into the group.
You will now see the statements again, sorted according to your previous step.
Sort each statement into an empty spot on the grid. Only one statement may occupy a single spot on the grid.
Statements sorted into the same column will have the same value indicated above the column. The order within a column does not matter.
Please answer the following questions regarding your response in the previous sort.
By clicking OK you acknowledge that you have read all relevant permission forms and agree to their terms and conditions
